reviews.review_msg: BUS413 - super chill professor. He is very nice and always happy to help students. Course-load is extremely light, two very short assignments, one group presentation, and final exam. The content is very easy for a 400-level finance course.

Jijun is my best prof in SFU. I took the BUS 410 and BUS 413 with him. His contents are very easy to understand. He is willing to answer students' questions and provide some help. His course is very useful!!!!!!

Had the opportunity to take Jijun in the Fall of 2022. One of the best professors at Beedie. Respectful, kind, and willing to answer questions students had. His assignments were very fair and consisted of 1 paper, and 1 assignment and 1 final. Lectures were very straightforward and liked that he was very clear with his outline and expectations.
Best prof ever in SFU. Very approachable and willing to share his academic and work experiences. Miss his lectures!
go to the lecture and take notes with all the examples go through during the lecture. great class and great prof

The best professor in finance. Prof Niu is very knowledgeable and he has the notes in a very organized way. You can easily relate everything he teaches in the whole term together. Would definitely take another course with him if he teaches another one (sadly he doesn't :( . Attend all the lectures then you can get an easy A.

Awesome prof. Organizes the course in such an easy to digest way. I wish all profs adopted his teaching style. Just be careful with the curve as he marks very easily. I'm almost certain my final percentage was well over 85% but received an A-. + Overall good guy vibe :)

Great professor. Clearly knows the content inside and out, structures the class in a clear and easy manner, and provides plenty of examples in lectures. Two assignments and a final; none are hard if you go to lecture and spend a bit of time on them.

Jijun is a great professor. He is very knowledgeable and encourages questions. There are two papers and a final. The papers are not difficult if you do some research and follow his guidelines. Overall, I enjoyed this class. Only surprises was doing very well on papers and the final and getting an A, not A+. I am assuming he gave few A+ and more As.

one of the best profs ever! kind, nice and knowledgeable! highly recommended! Read wall street journal and be insightful about the relationship between banking industry and economic condition. Enjoy the class!!
Easy 400+ course. Only two reports and one final. For reports, just follow the sample format. Read notes for exam(MC+short answer). The prof has little bit accent.
Enjoyed his lecture a lot. Always brings in interesting real life examples to help students learn. Very energetic and engaging prof! Highly recommended!
easy and practical. feels more like a 300-level introductory course.
One of the best prof in sfu, very clear and helpful with material.  Easy course but u actually get to learn a lot. totally recommend his class!

He is extremely friendly and nice. Unlike other 400 lvl finance courses, you actually learn A LOT of stuff in this course and can apply it to the real world. Very easy as well. Textbook is not needed. Just remember to take detailed notes during lectures cuz that's whats gonna be on the final
He is so nice and easy to get a high mark. He will his best to help the students all the time. Good!
